amendment.description: To require a plan to meet the demand for cyberspace career fields in the reserve components of the Armed Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 712 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 712 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Portman to Amendment SA 1003. (consideration: CR S5787; text: CR S5792) To require a plan to meet the demand for cyberspace career fields in the reserve components of the Armed Forces.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 712 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 712 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Portman to Amendment SA 1003.
